Ingredients.1: 0.5 pounds skinless, boneless chicken breasts, chopped

Ingredients.3: 1 (10 ounce) package frozen chopped spinach, thawed and squeezed dry

Ingredients.4: 1 (7.5 ounce) jar quartered artichoke hearts, drained and chopped

Ingredients.6: 1 (6 ounce) package shredded Parmesan cheese, divided

Ingredients.7: 4 large portobello mushroom caps, stems and gills removed

Ingredients.9: 1 salt and ground black pepper to taste

Directions.1: Combine chicken, Alfredo sauce, spinach, artichoke hearts, red pepper flakes, and 4 ounces of Parmesan cheese in a large bowl. Stir to combine.

Directions.2: Lightly rub the outside of each portobello with olive oil using your hands; season with salt and pepper.

Directions.3: Divide the chicken filling among the mushroom caps and top with remaining Parmesan cheese. Place mushroom caps on the grill pan of the Panasonic Countertop Induction Oven.

Directions.4: Press Auto Cook. Select Poultry with Vegetables setting and press Start. Turn the dial to select 2 pounds and press Start again. Cook until chicken is no longer pink and mushrooms are tender, about 23 minutes.
